snippet.title: Final Fantasy Adventure Part 1
snippet.description:
Happy Holidays!
Merry Chritsmas!
This is the first GameBoy game I have played in a LONG time.
From Christmas to the end of this playthrough is: FINAL FANTASY ADVENTURE for the GameBoy!
THIS GAME LOVES TO LAG WHEN I RECORD!
The Boy's original name is Matt.
The Girl's name is: Rose. (Original)
I DO have this game! It came out in 1991. Merely about 3 years before I was born. This game IS the first Seiken Densetsu game ever released. After this game came SECRET OF MANA, then Seiken Densetsu 3, to Legend of Mana, to Sword of Mana, then Dawn of Mana, to Children of Mana, and to Heroes of Mana.
